title: Jacob Samuel Allan
content:
Jacob Allan, 13, of Magee, passed from this life on Saturday December 19, 2015 in Magee. Funeral services will be held at 10:00 AM on Wednesday, December 23, 2015 at Corinth Baptist Church in Magee, Bro Jay Wesbrook and Bro Mack Harrison will officiate. Burial will be in Corinth Baptist Church Cemetery. Colonial Chapel Funeral Home of Magee is in charge of arrangements, (601)849-5031.
Visitation will be held on Tuesday, December 22, 2015 from 4:00 PM - 8:00 PM at Colonial Chapel Funeral Home of Magee in Magee. Surviving Family Members are: Parents, Phillip and Jean Allan, Magee, Brother - Michael Allan, Sister - Jessica Allan, Maternal Grandparents, May and Bobby McNeese, Paternal Grandparents, Gilbert and Linda Allan, Aunts - Caroline Robinson, Christy (Brad) Barr, Sonya (Ronny) Sumrall, Cousins - Erin Winningham, Justin Winningham, Bryce Andrus, Shelbi Sumrall.
Jacob was preceded by his Maternal Grandfather - George Robinson Serving as pallbearers are Ryan Herbert, Justin Winningham, Bryce Andrus, Michael Harrison, Trevor Maddox, Rocky McNeese, Calvin Blair, and Jarrod May,
Honorary Pallbearers will be Members of the Magee Fire Department, Covington County Fire and Sheriff Departments
